name: Daily Call Reports Summary
query:
SELECT 
    `tabDaily Call Report`.`manager_name` as "Manager Name", 
    `tabDaily Call Report`.`territory` as "Territory", 
    `tabDaily Call Report`.`area` as "Area",
    `tabCall Report Detail`.`doctor_name` as "Doctor Name",
    `tabCall Report Detail`.`last_day_of_visit` as "Last Date of Visit",
    `tabDoctor List`.`brick` as "Brick",
    `tabBrick Wise Sale Child`.`sale_qty` as "Business",
    Count(*) as "Total Visits"
FROM 
    `tabDaily Call Report`
INNER JOIN `tabCall Report Detail` ON `tabCall Report Detail`.parent=`tabDaily Call Report`.name
INNER JOIN `tabDoctor List` ON `tabDoctor List`.name=`tabCall Report Detail`.doctor_id
INNER JOIN `tabBrick Wise Sale Child` ON `tabBrick Wise Sale Child`.brick=`tabDoctor List`.brick
WHERE 
    `tabCall Report Detail`.`last_day_of_visit` BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
    `tabDoctor List`.`brick`
